<!-- on the root element set the dir attribute for rtl display format -->
<!-- in this example only the ones with icons (because they are mirrored) are displayed -->
<html lang="en" dir="rtl">
    [code goes here]
</html>

<!-- html code doesn't change from the ltr -->
<!-- regular button example -->
<button class="cmx-button ripple">
	<span class="cmx-button__icon cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	Add New
</button>

<!-- regular links example -->
<a class="cmx-button ripple" href="javascript:;">
	<span class="cmx-button__icon cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	Add New
</a>

<!-- primary buttons example -->
<button class="cmx-button cmx-button--primary ripple">
	<span class="cmx-button__icon cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	Add New
</button>

<!-- primary links example -->
<a class="cmx-button cmx-button--primary ripple" href="javascript:;">
	<span class="cmx-button__icon cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	Add New
</a>

<!-- support button example -->
<button class="cmx-button cmx-button--support ripple">
	<span class="cmx-button__icon cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	Add New
</button>

<!-- support links example -->
<a class="cmx-button cmx-button--support ripple" href="javascript:;">
	<span class="cmx-button__icon cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	Add New
</a>

<!-- support full buttons example -->
<button class="cmx-button cmx-button--support ripple is-full">
	<span class="cmx-button__icon cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	Add New
</button>


<!-- support full links example -->
<a class="cmx-button cmx-button--support ripple is-full" href="javascript:;">
	<span class="cmx-button__icon cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	Add New
</a>


<!-- buttons text with icon example -->
<button class="cmx-button cmx-button--icon cmx-button--text--icon">
	<span class="cmx-icon-trash" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	<span class="sr-only">Delete</span>
	<span class="cmx-button-text-label">Delete</span>
</button>


<!-- link text with icon example -->
<a class="cmx-button cmx-button--icon cmx-button--text--icon" href="javascript:;">
	<span class="cmx-icon-trash" aria-hidden="true"></span>
	<span class="sr-only">Delete</span>
	<span class="cmx-button-text-label">Delete</span>
</a>

											
											
										
// Buttons RTL _buttons-rtl.scss
// New sass partial created. Overrides only what is needed. It's included after the original buttons.scss styles.

html[dir="rtl"] .cmx-button {
	
	// the styles for an icon within the button

	&__icon {
		float: right; // modified
		margin-left: 8px; // modified
		margin-right: 0px; // added
	}

	&.button--text--icon {
		
		// span containing the icon remains static
		// we just float the text label to left, icon will move to the right

		.button-text-label {
			float: left;
		}
	}


	// THE SUPPORT BUTTONS STYLES

	&--support {
		
		// the styles for the icon within the support buttons
		.button__icon {
			float: right; // modified 
		}
	}
}
